name: files-and-folders-2
description: Files and Folders project with Angular and NestJS

scripts.build: pnpm build:fnf-data && pnpm build:fnf && pnpm build:fnf-api && pnpm build:fnf-api-test
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter fnf-data install && pnpm --filter fnf install && pnpm --filter fnf-api install --filter fnf-api-test install
scripts.docker:kill2: docker kill $(docker ps | grep  ' krocon/files-and-folders-2 ' | awk '{ print $1 }')
scripts.docker:container-remove: docker container rm fnf && docker image rm krocon/files-and-folders-2 -f
scripts.docker:print-container-id: docker ps | grep  ' krocon/files-and-folders-2 ' | awk '{ print $1 }'
scripts.docker:logs: docker logs $(docker ps | grep  ' krocon/files-and-folders-2 ' | awk '{ print $1 }')
